mapper.insert: insert into member (member_email, member_pw, member_nick, member_introduce, member_offer, when_join) values (#{memberEmail}, #{memberPw}, #{memberNick}, #{memberIntroduce}, #{memberOffer}, sysdate)

mapper.update: update member set when_login = sysdate where member_email = #{memberEmail}
